title: Digital Music Literacy and Composition Education Program for Inclusive Music Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: No prior experience in basic music theory or sheet music reading
context.additional_context: Digital environment-based programs designed to accommodate diverse learner needs, including those with visual processing disabilities.

learning_goals: Students can accurately identify and explain musical notation symbols and terminology with over 80% accuracy
Students can complete simple compositions of four or more measures utilizing basic musical structures (scales, rhythm, harmony)
Students can record, edit, and share their compositions using digital tools

resources: Assistive Technology Tools (Including Visual Support Features)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
